description.english: Gain entrance to the village of Markovna with the help of Lady Katarina.

displayName.english: Who needs machines when you've got SWAG!

description.english: Defeat the Drill Worm without the help of the Elyctric Discharger.
Defend the Lair without a single enemy getting in.
Defeat Professor Fulmigati with all of his Towers, etc. still intact.
Finish the game with a Hardcore character.
Finish the game with a non-Casual Hardcore character.
Finish the game with a Heroic Hardcore character.
The world of Van Helsing is an interesting place. Go out and explore! (Visit 3 different locations.)
The world of Van Helsing is an interesting place. Go out and explore! (Visit all locations.)
The Ink is a mysterious interesting place. Explore as much of it as you can! (Visit an Ink location.)
The Ink is a mysterious interesting place. Explore as much of it as you can! (Visit all Ink locations.)
Finish the Salvage Mission quest without setting off any explosives!
Escort the Traveling Merchant to the Romany Camp with him taking no damage.
Solve every side-quest in Markovna.
Solve every side-quest in the Helsing Lair.
Defeat Tweedledum.
Defeat Tweedledee.
Defeat The Rabbit.
Defeat the Mastermind Genius.
Defender of the Lair and defeat Breda.
Defeat the Marquis of Soot.
Defeat the Dark Alchemist.
Defeat the Frenzied Forest Spirit.
Defeat Judge Obesovsky.
Defeat the Wingless Messiah.
Defeat the Arachnid Leviathan.
Defeat Professor Fulmigati and finish the game.
Defeat the Gruumsh.
Defeat the Electriferous Beast-King.
Defeat the Electriferous Beast.
Defeat Ignis Fatuus.
Fight your way through the Orichalcum Mines and defeat the Drill Worm.
Take at least 20 pieces of loot (Gold piles included) from the Domovoy on the Gorgon Pass with a single character.
Kill all Chickens on the loose in Markovna.
Kill a Chicken with a Sword.
Deliver a Critical Hit against a Charging opponent with a Melee Weapon.
Deliver a Critical Hit against a Charging opponent with a Ranged Weapon.
Gather a Cirtical Hit chance of at least 50%.
Learn every Skill.
Auras and Tricks can come in handy in many situations. Learn an Aura or Trick.
Auras and Tricks can come in handy in many situations. Learn at least 5 Auras or Tricks.
Auras and Tricks can come in handy in many situations. Learn at least 10 Auras or Tricks.
Auras and Tricks can come in handy in many situations. Learn at least 20 Auras or Tricks.
Finish the game without killing a single Igor. (You know, those cute little guys with the flamethrowers!)
Let's be honest here. The most important part of a game like Van Helsing is the LOOT! So go out there and gather as much as you can! From chests. Loot 50 chests.
Let's be honest here. The most important part of a game like Van Helsing is the LOOT! So go out there and gather as much as you can! From chests. Loot 100 chests.
Let's be honest here. The most important part of a game like Van Helsing is the LOOT! So go out there and gather as much as you can! From chests. Loot 200 chests.
Let's be honest here. The most important part of a game like Van Helsing is the LOOT! So go out there and gather as much as you can! From chests. Loot 500 chests.

Completely fill up the Alchemy tab of your Inventory so you can't pick up any new Alchemical items.
Pull out the Excalibur from the stone.
Find all Mystical Albino Animal Body Parts and eat them.
Complete The weapon shipment quest.
Complete The orichalcum shipment quest.
Complete the Start the Generator quest.
Swim through 20 Garbage Containers.
Defeat the Rabbit with the Bunnyslayer.
Answer all the Riddle Wisps correctly (so you don't have to fight them).
Find the hidden treasure of King Borislav the Just.
Retrieve King Borislav's Royal Scepter.

displayName.english: Let loose the ghost of war

description.english: Let Lady Katarina kill a Boss. (Delivering the final blow is enough.)
Building a lot of traps can help you though some tight spots if your Lair is ever attacked. (Wink-wink!) Have 25 traps built at the same time.
Building a lot of traps is cool but do you know, what's even more cool? Building lots of different traps! (Have one of all different trap types built at the same time.)
